## Vector4 class

Vector4 class created for EulerAngle class conversion to Quaternion

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class Vector4 
```

|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(x, y, z, w)](./decentraland-ecs.vector4.(constructor).md) |  | Creates a Vector4 object from the given floats. |

|  [y](./decentraland-ecs.vector4.y.md) |  | <code>number</code> | y value of the vector |
